resources.string:
Hi, my name is Ethan. 

I love lego. 
My most expensive lego set I have is the UCS/ AT_AT. 

I like to eat rib and my favorite breakfast idem is pancake and sausage. 

Games Im good at is Star Wars Battlefront 2 EA or OG, game mode HVV/ heroes vs villains. 

I sometimes like riding my bike and running. 

Im a toxic player In Star Wars Battlefront 2 if you make me made i will make you uninstalled the game 

If you meet me im nice but in the game Im death straight UP. 

Vader mains have no skill and if your going to be on my team you better have six hour of game play if not uninstall the game because your trash.
